lines.text: It should be our last round. Misha is awake.
Final Attack! Calvary! Charging from the behind. Break the enemies line. I am gonna to win!
Damn.. 1 point.
Hahahah, failed attack.
The last step. Your general is down. I win.
(WarDancer morning call? Oh, the ones with terrible painting. Andrew is its owner.)
(Andrew, who ranks #9 WarDancer player in the world, thinks it’s a waste of time painting carefully on the pieces.)
(If I remember it correctly, he is on the dean's list of Economics Department.)
(Killi, my roommate , also an art student, really like the painting on his pieces. It doesn't matter.)
(I'm a biology student. I was going to graduate this year.)
(However, the plague came. From the last news we get on the television, everyone in this island we know except ourselves becomes zombies.)
(Luckily, we planned to have a board game party in this cabin for a whole week. We get here three days before the plague spread.)
We should prepare for going now.
Overnight, I have analyzed the plague according to my observation. It’ s terribly weird.
It creates zombies with fuzzy animal hats and sleep walks all days. The plague is spread by touching and eating. That's all what I know.
We'd better go together.
It seems that we should first decide our destination. What are the possible ones?
Maybe the harbor?
Sure. We can leave the whole island by boat. As you know, my father owns a fishing company, so I know where we can get a boat there.
We can also choose to go to the Kiminosed research building. I believe they have special ways to protect us from the plague.
Oh, the mysterious lab. How can you make sure that we can get in?
Well, my mom works there.
Okay. Any other thoughts?
Sounds great. Let’s have a final check with our package and begin our journey.
